As you progress, youâll unlock new characters with wildly diverse looks and effects. Thereâs a teeny-tiny flea, an emo goose, and even a few characters from other gamesâlike Epoch, who sprays cars with blocky bullets. The creativity and care put into Crossy Roadâs wacky world are unmistakable.
